dataValueTemplate.annotation: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient_program WHERE program_id=1 AND DATE(date_enrolled) between :startOfPeriod and :endOfPeriod

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT patient_id, DATE(created_on) AS qa FROM ( SELECT patient_id, created_on FROM triage_patient_queue_log WHERE triage_concept_id=5123
UNION ALL
SELECT patient_id, created_on FROM opd_patient_queue_log WHERE opd_concept_id=5704 ) AS ql WHERE CONCAT(patient_id,'-',DATE(ql.created_on)) NOT IN ( SELECT CONCAT(patient_id,'-',DATE(date_enrolled))X FROM patient_program WHERE program_id=1 ) AND patient_id IN ( SELECT patient_id FROM patient_program WHERE program_id=1 AND (DATE(date_completed) IS NULL OR DATE(date_completed) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod ) ) GROUP BY patient_id, DATE(created_on) ) AS fqlog
SELECT count(*) FROM patient_state WHERE state = '25' AND start_date BETWEEN :startOfPeriod and :endOfPeriod
SELECT count(*) FROM patient_state WHERE state = '26' AND start_date BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod

SELECT count(*) FROM obs o INNER JOIN patient_program pp ON pp.patient_id = o.person_id WHERE o.concept_id = 995 AND value_numeric < 11 AND pp.program_id = 1 AND o.date_created BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM obs WHERE concept_id=1425 AND value_numeric=4 AND DATE(obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod

SELECT Count(*) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT q.person_id, DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate) / 365 age FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT o.person_id, DATE(o.obs_datetime) o_date FROM obs o WHERE o.concept_id = 3057 AND o.value_coded = 782
UNION ALL
SELECT v.patient_id, v.date_started FROM visit v INNER JOIN patient_program pp ON pp.patient_id = v.patient_id AND pp.program_id = 1 WHERE v.visit_type_id = 2 ) AS q INNER JOIN person p ON q.person_id=p.person_id AND o_date BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod ) preg WHERE age BETWEEN 10 AND 14

SELECT Count(*) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT q.person_id, DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate) / 365 age FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT o.person_id, DATE(o.obs_datetime) o_date FROM obs o WHERE o.concept_id = 3057 AND o.value_coded = 782
UNION ALL
SELECT v.patient_id, v.date_started FROM visit v INNER JOIN patient_program pp ON pp.patient_id = v.patient_id AND pp.program_id = 1 WHERE v.visit_type_id = 2 ) AS q INNER JOIN person p ON q.person_id=p.person_id AND o_date BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod ) preg WHERE age BETWEEN 15 AND 19

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT person_id, obs_id, DATE(o.value_datetime)dod ,( SELECT DATE(date_enrolled) FROM patient_program pg WHERE pg.program_id=2 AND o.person_id = pg.patient_id AND DATE(pg.date_enrolled) >= DATE(o.obs_datetime) ORDER BY pg.date_enrolled DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS enrol
FROM obs o INNER JOIN encounter en ON en.encounter_id = o.encounter_id AND en.encounter_type=20
WHERE o.concept_id=5599 AND DATE(obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod ) AS rcv WHERE DATEDIFF(enrol, dod) <= 3

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT person_id, obs_id, DATE(o.value_datetime)dod ,( SELECT DATE(date_enrolled) FROM patient_program pg WHERE pg.program_id=2 AND o.person_id = pg.patient_id AND DATE(pg.date_enrolled) >= DATE(o.obs_datetime) ORDER BY pg.date_enrolled DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS enrol
FROM obs o INNER JOIN encounter en ON en.encounter_id = o.encounter_id AND en.encounter_type=20
WHERE o.concept_id=5599 AND DATE(obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod ) AS rcv WHERE DATEDIFF(enrol, dod) BETWEEN 3 AND 6
